nodes.text: Us Magazine Collector's Edition - Star Wars Rogue One

Us Magazine Collector's Edition: Star Wars Rogue One is a collector's edition issue of US Magazine. A standalone issue, it was released on November, 2016, and, as indicated by the title, will cover in full depth the then-upcoming film Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, as well as the Solo: A Star Wars Story and Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi to a certain extent, and will include several photos and stories on development and three movie posters related to the film, one of which was the original 1977 movie poster for Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope (then-titled Star Wars).

The Star Wars: Rogue One bookazine from the editors of Us Weekly is a full-color celebration of the latest Star Wars offering -- Rogue One, opening in theaters this December. The special-interest publication will feature a heavy-stock cover, as well as exclusive photos from Rogue One and interviews conducted by Us with Rogue One's star, Felicity Jones, director Gareth Edwards, and all of the other major actors from the highly-anticipated film. The book will also introduce readers to Alden Ehrenreich, who will play the young Han Solo in an upcoming spin-off film, and provide a detailed preview of what fans can expect from the film's release this December!
